concept.title: Update Attached External References
concept.shortdesc: If the xref drawings are changed, you can update the xref to the latest version whenever you want.

conbody.p: To update a xref, start Xref Manager using XREF command. The status of updated xrefs displayed in the list is "Needs reloading", and you can update these xrefs by clicking the Reload button.
Once the xrefs are reloaded, the system automatically updates each xref when you open the attached drawing file directly to show the latest xrefs.
